Package com.vsta.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.vsta.service.UserService
@Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
User Service tasks that use DAO methods and used for REST APIs for User Object.

  • Method Details

    • saveUser

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> saveUser​(User user)
      Add User to database if data passes validity checks.
      Parameters:
      user - User object at registration with plain password.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a status code and message indicating if user is added successfully.

    • getUserByEmail

      public User getUserByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Get User with specified email in database.
      Parameters:
      email - Email of a User.
      Returns:
      User object if can be found, else null.

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById​(int id)
      Get User with specified id in database.
      Parameters:
      id - ID to uniquely identify a User.
      Returns:
      User object if can be found, else null.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser​(User user)
      Update User with same ID from database.
      Parameters:
      user - User object with updated details.

    • addToken

      public void addToken​(User user)
      Generate and save token of User who successfully requested the password reset into database.
      Parameters:
      user - User object of requester.

    • resetPasswordRequest

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> resetPasswordRequest​(java.lang.String email)
      Specific method to send mail to User.
      Parameters:
      email - User Email specified.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a status code and message indicating successful sending of email.
